Lakewood.Hilltop, Tacoma, Washington:
The Hilltop Neighborhood is a historically diverse neighborhood in the Tacoma, Washington Central District.

The National Register of Historic Places specifies the geographic area of Hilltop as located within the City of Tacoma and bounded on the east by Tacoma Avenue South, on the north by Division Street, on the west by Sprague Avenue, and on the south by the edge of the bluff, which roughly equates to South 27th Street. Hilltop derives its name from its location on a high bluff overlooking Commencement Bay and the Port of Tacoma.
